plot: Officers Nolan and Bradford hope they can de-escalate a drug war before any innocent lives are lost. Meanwhile, Officer Harper hopes she can get Officer Chen ready to go undercover.

When some drug dealers are killed, everyone thinks La Fiera is retaliating for her son's death by the Madrigals. Lopez meets with La Fiera to convince her to stand down, but she doesn't. A DEA agent wants Lopez to work with him but she doesn't like him. Nolan and Bradford keep an eye on Madrigal. Chen is given an opportunity to go undercover, Harper tries to get her ready. West learns Stanton is back on the job. He Informs Grey who tells him there's nothing that can be done so he turns to Prof. Ryan who suggests he goes on TV to talk about Stanton. He tells Grey of his plans who warns him there could be repercussions, So they try to find another way.—Rcs0411@yahoo.com
